attributes.description: ONE OWNER VEHICLE BELONGED TO AN ELDERLY GENTLEMAN, DIRECTOR OF A PUBLIC COMPANY WHO SPENT THE MAJORITY OF HIS YEAR ABROAD HENCE THE CRAZY LOW MILEAGE, The car looks, feels and drives like it is brand spanking new, every single service completed annually on schedule and up to date including service recently completed Titanium Silver metallic, Black leather upholstery is like brand spanking new and finished with brushed aluminum trim, THE MOST STUNNING COMBINATION FULLY LOADED WITH ALL THE EXTRAS AND LUXURIES including Satellite Navigation Amazing V6 Engine offers 225 KW of brilliant performance, It simply does not get any better than this Rare opportunity to own a proper GERMAN PERFORMANCE V6 MACHINE with extraordinarily low mileage for much less than a 5 YEAR OLD VW POLO VIVO must be seen to be believed THE ONE AND ONLY PERFORMANCE MERC WITH LOW MILEAGE AND COMPRHENSIVE HISTORY AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE ANYWHERE IN SA Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit prefitted, for your safety and security DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
